jobs.title: UI Engineer
jobs.description: I was part of the Logs team at LogicMonitor, which was based in Stockholm. From the time I started the product grew a lot and we faced some interesting challenges. One of the things I worked on was building a new micro frontend for the logs page. The Stockholm office was closed in 2023.

jobs.title: Front-end developer
jobs.description: Origo is one of the biggest IT companies in Iceland. In my time there I worked in two departments, Travel Solutions and Healthcare Solutions. I worked on a variety of projects, including the biggest car rental system in the country and Heilsuvera, the national health portal.

jobs.title: Intern programmer
jobs.description: I worked as an intern for one summer at NextCode in the back-end team. NextCode has since changed its name to Genuity Science.

jobs.title: Layout designer
jobs.description: I designed the layout of the printed paper at Icelandic newspapers DV and Stundin. I think many of the same principles apply to printed and digital media, so this was a good foundation for me to build on.
